title: How to make money with my band - Quora

response.answer_text: Make your own covers, post them on youtube!2. Tie up with event managers in your city, show them your videos. Keep uploading your videos 3. Do some free gigs for your promotion. Share your live videos. 4. Keep jamming at public places, keep your cards handy. 5. Be consistent, you will start getting paid shows! www.paranoidfusionband.com
